## Introduction

There are references and design information for a QuadraFilar Helicoidal (QFH) antenna. 

There is a [live calcuator](/live/qfhcalc.qmd) based on the highly cited work of [@jcoppens]. 

Originally interested in the idea because of this [Cornell project](https://crowdfunding.cornell.edu/project/44450) that recommended one for a TinyGS ground site.
